name: MIlk Powder
description: Client (M/57) is currently unemployed and has chronic medical conditions. He lives in a 2 room rental flat with a family of 5. The family is facing financial hardship and is struggling to afford basic necessities. For further details, feel free to reach out to Kritikaa at 8777 0959 or email to kritikaa.subramaniam@thkmc.org.sg to liase. Thank you.

name: Baby safety gate
description: hii ! we have a Client who is currently pregnant just shifted into their new rental flat with her partner and children. As she is nearing her EDD, she is hoping to ensure that her new rental flat has sufficient basic furniture from donors to prepare for the arrival of newborn given her tight financial situation. We hope that this baby safety gate will be helpful for the family and to ensure child's safety, donor to kindly cover transport arrangement and delivery cost please. Thank you

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Tasya Puspita Maulany

name: Milk Powder
description:
Milk & Diapers
Client lives in a 4-room HDB flat with her elderly parents, husband and their four young children, aged 10, 5, 4, and 1. The family is currently facing financial challenges due to bankruptcy and the monthly household income is insufficient to meet the family's basic needs. Family is seeking support for essential items such as NAN Optipro Stage 3 and Dumex Dugro Stage 5 for their young children. For further liaison, kindly WhatsApp me at 98598768, I will respond from 9am to 5pm on weekdays. Thank you very much!

name: Milk Powder
description: Client (F/52) is the main caregiver to her 3 grandchildren. As she is currently unemployed and his accumulated multiple debts, she has difficulties affording milk powder for her youngest granddaughter (F/1). Donation of Enfagrow Milk Powder (Stage 3) will be helpful to Client. Please WhatsApp Rina at 8666 1352 or email to rinaprasad@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

name: Milk Powder
description: Client (M/45) and his wife are currently unemployed and residing in a shelter. They have been struggling to provide their 2-month-old baby with basic necessities as they have no source of income or savings. We are seeking donor to provide baby cot for the growth of the baby and your kind support will greatly ease their burden. Please Whatsapp Kritikaa at 8777 0959 or email to kritikaa.subramaniam@thkmc.org.sg to liase.

name: Fridge
description: Family of 4 with 2 school-going children staying in a 2-room rental flat who requires a fridge as their current one is faulty. Single mother is unable to work due to health issues. Would greatly appreciate if donor is able to cover transportation costs.

passiton.name: LG GL131SQW Bar Fridge (90L)

- Energy efficient

- In good working condition, hardly use. 
- Some scratches on the door due to the magnets.
